enable.label: Enable
enable.comment: Select if the process can be executed.

enable.label: Enable
enable.comment: If you set this value to "No" the files gonna be used from your local folders.

local.label: Local folder
local.comment: Example: /folder (do not use slash at the end)

remote.label: Remote folder
remote.comment: Example: /folder (do not use slash at the end)

filter_files.label: Filter Files
filter_files.comment: If you set this option as "No" all the files from this folder will be used by this process. Set this value to "Yes" if you need filter the files to be downloaded.

filter_pattern.label: Search Files With
filter_pattern.comment: Only files with this text in the name will be downloaded by this process.

local.label: Local folder
local.comment: Example: /folder (do not use slash at the end)

remote.label: Remote folder
remote.comment: Example: /folder (do not use slash at the end)

save_days_logs.label: Save logs for
save_days_logs.comment: Sets how many days of logs you want to save.

cron_syntax.label: Cron Syntax
cron_syntax.comment:
like a cron syntax:
Daily at 5 AM * 5 * * *
Daily (at midnight) @daily

names.comment: Set "yes" if the file will use a first line with the attributes names.
